library.name: CryptoMd5
library.description: Used to generate SHA1 hashes of data. As SHA1 is not 100% secure anymore, please use with caution. This ought to only be used for compatibility with legacy systems and not used in any new system.

class.name: Md5Hash

function.name: (constructor)
function.description: Creates a new instance of the SHA1 hash and, by default, prints out a warning message about it being unsafe.

arg.name: suppressWarning
arg.description: This parameter will suppress the warning if you pass in the string 'unsafe'.
